casebody.data:
THE FARMERS AND MECHANICS’ NATIONAL BANK OF BUFFALO, Plaintiffs and Respondents, v. THOMAS ATKINSON, Impleaded with ERASTUS S. BROWN, Defendant and Appellant. Decided June 25, 1877.

Before Sedgwick and Speir, JJ.

Appeal from judgment entered on verdict for plaintiff. This case involved the same questions as are presented in the case of the Farmers and Mechanics’ National Bank of Buffalo v. Brown, Logan and Preston, reported 10 J. & S. 522. The decision in this case is governed by the decision in that. Speir, J.,

wrote for affirmance with costs.

Sedgwick, J., concurred.
